page.title: 07Finchingfield,Tourists.
page.content: In Finchingfield we have a lot of tourists. The first thing you see when you get to the main part 0f the village is a duck pond with the church on the hill behind. Well we call it a duck pond but really it is a widened stream. We have a lot of tourists come every day ,even when it is raining. When it is hot there are lots and lots of people and you can't move.A lot of the people that come are old people who come with a group on a bus and others just come to enjoy the view. People come from all over England and even from abroad . As there are so many tourists there are extra pubs,a restaurant and more shops than you would normaly find in a village of this size.
